# jemisc

This is a personal package for various, i.e. *misc* things.

## Installation

You can install the released version of jemisc from GitHub with:

```r
remotes::install_github("jemus42/jemisc")
```

## Example

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(rmarkdown)
library(knitr)

library(jemisc)
cite_loaded_pkgs() %>%
  kable()
```
